duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct diagnostic sonography procedures and obtain diagnostic images in accordance with medical protocols
Explain ultrasound procedures, pregnancy tests, and options counseling to patients while addressing their concerns and providing comfort
Analyze technical information related to procedures and provide preliminary digital summaries to the reading physician
Coordinate with other staff members regarding follow-up care and medical appointments
Manage client intake and release forms, and maintain ultrasound scanning equipment
Assist in selecting new equipment or necessary updates to ultrasound machines and processes
Provide ultrasound data reports and maintain patient files and forms
Communicate effectively and compassionately with patients and build supportive relationships during medical appointments
Perform STI tests, assess patient risk, and provide counseling and necessary referrals
Operate ultrasound scanning equipment and maintain a supply of current printed forms
Communicate with the Medical Director regarding any questions or emergencies related to ultrasound scans
